sn26.9:1.2: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the earth element,
sn26.9:1.7: and the consciousness element is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn26.9:1.8: The cessation of the earth element,
sn26.9:1.13: and the consciousness element is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
